title: durop77
author: durop77
content: Many times driving in the subway, I saw a folded dollar in a phone case, and it was in different countries. I thought there was some kind of fashion among young people, it turned out to be a financial chain. To attract money, you need to fold $ 1 in a triangle and put the larger side in a convenient place to attract money. Do you think this method is working, what causes such a popular idea of putting money in a triangle to attract big money. Does it work, maybe among your friends there are those who have already done the same? Does such a monetary amulet work and will it work economically for you.

comments.author: ftopikit
comments.body: My friend also walks with such an amulet, I didn't even suspect that $ 1 brings economic well-being. I thought it was just a trend in young girls.)))))

comments.author: noorman0
comments.body: It's just part of the traditional belief, there are certain generations only do it as a tribute to the traditions of their ancestors. Even the Chinese in my environment have more mystical variations to "bring in" money and luck.However, one has to look at the phenomenon in a rational way whereby, "to make money, you have to do something that has value".

comments.author: Wolyusi
comments.body: This is an amulet, most likely it has an effect if you believe in it yourself.

comments.author: Van King
comments.body: I've actually heard about the practice of folding a dollar bill in a triangle to attract money. While it may be seen as a superstitious belief or a fun tradition, I don't personally think it has any real impact on attracting wealth. It's more of a symbol or reminder to stay positive and hopeful about financial abundance.

comments.author: Keikei Tan
comments.body: It's interesting how certain practices, like folding a dollar bill in a triangle, become popularized and associated with attracting money. Personally, I view it more as a psychological reminder to stay focused on our financial goals rather than a magical charm. If you're looking for a practical way to boost your income, have you considered becoming a BK8 affiliate? They offer a reputable affiliate program that can provide additional earnings alongside your main endeavors.

comments.author: Zixuan Gang
comments.body: Ah, the folded dollar bill in a triangle to attract money! It's fascinating how these beliefs and rituals become widespread. While I'm not convinced that it has any real effect on one's wealth, I believe that the power of mindset and taking proactive steps towards financial success are more impactful

comments.author: Lenny Lau
comments.body: The practice of folding a dollar bill in a triangle to attract money is quite popular among some people. While I don't personally believe in the superstition, I think it's important to focus on practical strategies for financial success. One such strategy could be exploring additional income streams like the BK8 affiliate program. It allows you to earn extra income while leveraging your existing business or interests. So, instead of relying solely on monetary amulets, consider taking action and exploring viable opportunities to improve your economic situation.

comments.author: peter0425
comments.body: Quote from: durop77 on May 25, 2023, 06:03:03 AM Many times driving in the subway, I saw a folded dollar in a phone case, and it was in different countries. I thought there was some kind of fashion among young people, it turned out to be a financial chain. To attract money, you need to fold $ 1 in a triangle and put the larger side in a convenient place to attract money. Do you think this method is working, what causes such a popular idea of putting money in a triangle to attract big money. Does it work, maybe among your friends there are those who have already done the same? Does such a monetary amulet work and will it work economically for you.Positive thoughts will also attract luck , this is about the belief mate and nothing is certain , if you think this will help then have yourself.But me? nope I am not because what I do believe is that everything comes because of our dedication and action and also doing what is good for you to receive best also.

comments.author: devil-soul
comments.body: It's like a good luck charm but i don't know if it really works, if it attracts money
